descriptor.name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) Enrollment Assignment
descriptor.short_desc: Assignment: Demonstrate the APY enrollment process for a worker and document your steps and reflections.
descriptor.long_desc:
Assignment Overview:
This assignment asks you to apply your knowledge of the Atal Pension Yojana (APY) by simulating or assisting with the enrollment of a worker in the scheme. You should document each step, from verifying eligibility to completing the auto-debit setup for monthly contributions.

  1. Task:
    Guide a hypothetical or real worker through APY enrollment, ensuring all requirements are met and the appropriate pension amount is selected.
  2. Documentation:
    Record the process, note any challenges and solutions, and include screenshots or filled forms if possible.
  3. Reflection:
    Write a brief reflection on the importance of APY for unorganized sector workers and what you learned from this assignment.

Why Complete This Assignment:

  • Strengthen your practical understanding of APY procedures.
  • Prepare to help others access government pension schemes.
  • Gain real-world experience as a financial advisor or community facilitator.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
